snippet: The training is scheduled to start in March and is expected to involve 15,000 rebels as part of the American-led effort to combat ISIS, the official said.
abstract: Senior Turkish official says country is prepared to finalize agreement to help train and equip moderate Syrian rebels, joint effort between American and Turkish military officers; training is part of American-led effort to fight Islamic State fighters.
lead_paragraph: The training is scheduled to start in March and is expected to involve 15,000 rebels as part of the American-led effort to combat ISIS, the official said.

headline.main: Turkey Will Help Train Moderate Syrian Rebels, Diplomat Says

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
